overview:
Darren Lee is the co-founder of WorkCrowd.

WorkCrowd is a social platform for the workplace that focuses primarily on building relationships and strengthening bonds among co-workers. We believe when co-workers understand each other better, become closer and find ways to work together more efficient, it will eventually benefit not just careers but also the company too.

WorkCrowd has been selected as Top 10 Asia’s Best Startups in Echelon Singapore 2011.
